title: Idea for April Fools
body:
I was about to log in this morning and I saw the new jinx login screen and I had a cool thought.
Maybe if Riot wanted to do something cool for April Fool's day they could make an online java based minigame where you play as firecracker jinx and use basic controls to steer the rocket she's flying on around buildings/terrain. Kinda like helicopter (Or angry birds I guess)
I think it would be a fun thing :)

replies.body: I'm having a go at this. No art assets yet, but I've got the basic system coded.

What I was think would be funny is if they made so that in every non-ranked game whenever someone tries to place a ward in the bush it will place it outside the closest edge of the bush so for the first few wards everyone will be wondering why they keep ward failing.
